img_text: BREAKING NEWS NIPSEY HUSSLE HOLDER CHARGED WITH MURDER 348 likes cultureclt The Los Angeles County District Attorney's Office have charged Holder with four counts, including one count of murder, two counts of attempted murder and a charge of being a felon in possession of a firearm. He faces the possibility of life in prison if convicted.N #RIPNipseyHussie #EricHolder #NipseyHussle #StopTheViolence #BlackLivesMatter #CultureCultTM
